name: NERVINO Esterina
education: PhD (The Hong Kong Polytechnic University), MA (Universita' degli Studi di Modena e Reggio Emilia), BA (Universita' degli Studi della Calabria)
research interest: Social Semiotics, Multimodal Discourse Analysis, Corpus Linguistics, and ESP.
